settings.text: Welcome to a New Era of Hair Restoration

Hello, I'm Carlos Piña, the CEO of Xtrallux. As someone who has personally undergone a hair transplant, I understand the profound impact it can have on your appearance and entire life. It's not just about restoring hair—it's about reclaiming confidence. That's why at Xtrallux, we're committed to connecting you with the finest hair restoration surgeons nationwide.
A Personal Message from Carlos Piña, CEO of Xtrallux
Call | +1 (305) 400-4464 | or complete the form below.
Why the Surgeon's Artistry Matters

• Crafting Natural Results: A great hair transplant surgeon is not just a medical professional but an artist. Creating a natural-looking hairline requires precision, an understanding of natural hair growth patterns, and an artistic eye, all of which are crucial for seamless, undetectable results.
  • Experience You Can Trust: We leverage our deep industry knowledge and connections to ensure you are treated by the most skilled and experienced surgeons who are leaders in the field of hair restoration.
Exclusive Benefits of Choosing Xtrallux

• Direct Access to Expertise: Have direct conversations with me, Carlos Piña, about the nuances of hair transplants, what to expect, and how to ensure the best results. My firsthand experience as a patient gives me unique insights that I am eager to share with you.
  • Top Surgeons at Special Rates: Through our exclusive network, gain access to top-tier hair restoration surgeons who typically may have long waitlists or higher fees.
Complimentary Turbo Pro Laser Cap

Every hair transplant through our network includes a free Xtrallux Turbo Pro Laser Cap valued at $3000. This device enhances your transplant results by supporting hair growth and ensuring the longevity of your new hair.
| Xtrallux Turbo Pro |Professional Hair Regrowth.

• Professional Laser Count: Equipped with 316 laser diodes for extensive scalp coverage.
  • Clinically Proven Technology: Utilizes FDA-cleared technology proven effective in hair regrowth.
  • High Energy Output: Delivers 1580 mW of laser power for intensive treatment, providing laser density previously only available in clinics.
  • Non-Invasive Therapy: Offers a pain-free alternative to surgical hair restoration methods.
For Industry Professionals: Become a Provider »

settings.title: Non-Invasive and Pain-Free
settings.text:
Unlike hair transplants which are surgical procedures, Xtrallux offers a non-invasive solution.

This means no surgery, no scars, and no downtime. It's an ideal option for those who are apprehensive about surgical procedures or want to avoid the discomfort and recovery time associated with hair transplants.

settings.title: Clinically-Proven Technology
settings.text:
Xtrallux uses Photobiomodulation Therapy (PBMT), a technology clinically proven to treat Androgenetic Alopecia (AGA).

This technology is FDA-cleared, ensuring both safety and efficacy in promoting hair growth.

settings.title: Complementary to Hair Transplant
settings.text:
For those who opt for hair transplant surgery, Xtrallux can be an excellent complementary treatment.

It can help in the post-surgery phase to stimulate the growth of transplanted hair and enhance the overall health and thickness of existing hair.

settings.heading: Convenience and Portability
settings.description:
The Xtrallux Hair Regrowth Cap is designed for daily use with just 6 minutes required per session. It comes with a rechargeable power pack and is easily portable.

This allows users to continue their treatment anywhere, anytime, without disrupting their daily routine.

settings.heading: Suitable for Various Hair Loss Stages
settings.description:
Xtrallux is effective for males with Norwood-Hamilton Classifications of IIa to V and females with Ludwig (Savin) Scale I-1 to I-4 II-1, II-2, or frontal, catering to a wide range of hair loss patterns.
Benefit: It offers a versatile solution for different stages of hair loss, making it a suitable option for a broader audience.

settings.heading: Cost-Effective Over Time
settings.description:
The cost of a single hair transplant procedure can be substantial. In contrast, Xtrallux offers a one-time purchase for ongoing use.
It provides a more affordable and sustainable long-term solution for hair regrowth without the need for repeated costly procedures.

settings.heading: Safety and Regulatory Compliance
settings.description:
Xtrallux meets high safety and regulatory standards, classified as a Class II medical device by the US FDA and compliant with IEC 60825 for Class 3R Laser Products.
Users can be confident in a product that adheres to strict safety guidelines and is built with user well-being in mind.

settings.text: How Laser Therapy Helps Hair Regrowth

Low-Level Laser Therapy (LLLT) utilizes specific wavelengths of light to stimulate hair follicles. This light energy enhances cellular activity in the scalp, promoting hair growth. Xtrallux targets weakened follicles, increasing blood circulation and nutrient flow, which strengthens hair, reduces hair loss, and encourages new growth. In just 6 minutes a day, Xtrallux harnesses FDA-cleared, clinically-proven technology to nurture the growth of new, healthier hair.
Hair Follicles Treated with Laser Therapy

settings.heading: Is Laser Therapy Right for Your Hair Loss?
settings.content: Xtrallux Hair Regrowth caps are recommended for adults (men or women) who are experiencing mild to moderate hair loss due to androgenic alopecia with Fitzpatrick Skin Types I to IV as per indications for use. If your hair loss is advanced or due to scarring alopecias, this device is not right for you. Please consult with your healthcare provider for other types of hair loss (ie. medically-induced, areata, universalis, or totalis alopecias, effluvium, etc) and skin types.

settings.heading: Will laser therapy work for me if I'm bald?
settings.content: Xtrallux is indicated for mild to moderate hair loss cases. If you're hair loss is advanced, you are not a candidate for laser therapy. Please read the indications for use on the product pages for detail.

settings.heading: Is laser therapy dangerous for dark skin tones?
settings.content: Laser therapy at 650 nm and <5mW has never had any reported adverse effects for ANY skin tone, including the darkest of skin tones but due to limitations in testing protocols has only been clinically tested for treatment of AGA on skin types 1-4. Xtrallux devices are not cleared for dark skin tones due to the substantial equivalence process of FDA clearances.

settings.heading: Does laser therapy really work to treat hair loss?
settings.content:
Yes. The United States Food & Drug Administration has cleared Xtrallux hair regrowth devices as effective for treating androgenetic alopecia (see full indication for use). The clearance is based on substantiation by earlier submissions to the FDA providing clinical data to verify that this type of medical device emitting red laser energy results in an increase in terminal hair counts over the course of time with continued use. Terminal hair is defined as long, coarse, well-pigmented hair which differs from vellus hair. 

Xtrallux manufactures devices use this technology which has been proven to increase counts of terminal hair in clinical trials accepted as substantiation by the FDA for prior clearances for this device classification.

Keep in mind that results will vary from person to person. Each case is different.
